default.content: Prefer creating deterministic, testable Python scripts. Keep column names exactly as in the Excel template.

commands.name: batchdata:scaffold
commands.prompt: Create the /pipeline scaffold and empty modules io.py, normalize.py, batchdata.py, transform.py, run.py per the PRD.

commands.name: batchdata:implement
commands.prompt: Implement all modules using requests, pandas, python-dotenv. Respect CONFIG toggles. Add a dry-run cost estimator and unit tests.

commands.name: batchdata:tests
commands.prompt: Write pytest tests with fixtures that mock HTTP responses for async endpoints, validating exploding/aggregation and scrubs.
